prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with sleek fur and sharp lightning bolt features.
Imagine a blue quadruped with yellow spikes and a dynamic pose for a powerful attack.
Show me a Pokemon that harnesses electrical energy, with a vibrant color scheme and striking eyes.
Generate a fierce-looking creature that blends agility and electricity, showcasing its unique features.
Make a Pokemon design that captures the essence of speed and electricity with a bold color palette.
Design a creature with a mix of blue and yellow that embodies the spirit of lightning storms.
Give me an electric wolf Pokemon that stands out with its distinctive fur patterns and features.
